summary: Updated GEMINI_ARCHITECTURE_CONSULTATION.md with new questions focused on Frontend, Backend, and Database architecture. Added 14 new detailed questions covering: JavaScript code organization, Tailwind CSS v4 structure, Blade components organization, frontend performance, Service vs Actions strategy, Events implementation, Exception handling, API design, database schema design, relationships optimization, seeding strategies, caching strategy, Livewire+Actions integration, and frontend-backend communication. Document now reflects completed Phase 1 progress and asks Gemini to answer based on current project state and completed refactoring work.
